summary: The customer service representative at Contoso Wireless provided the customer with information about their downgrade plans, which include basic coverage with limited access to the 4G LTE network and a more premium plan with unlimited access. Both plans come with unlimited talk and text, access to the nationwide network, and access to customer support. Additionally, the customer was informed that they could save money each month on their bill by downgrading and that they could receive a one-time $50 credit towards their next bill by taking advantage of the current promotion.
